title: Dot Cottons
description: Summer is here, and we’re hoping the sun will be out on Midsummer Common so everyone has plenty of time to top up their tan at Strawberry Fair before heading to see us for a great mix of current and classic hits, 80s/90s mixes and summer tunes! Hope you have a sweet tooth as there will be plenty of strawberry sweets around the club and fruity alcoholic jellies behind the bar – see you there!
